CustomField.description: Number of months to payback (Cost divided by monthly amount = # of months)
CustomField.formula: IF(Monthly_Amount__c = 0, NULL, CASE(Trans_Category__c, "Rental", Total_Cost__c , "Carry On", Total_Cost__c , 0) / Monthly_Amount__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of months to payback (Cost divided by monthly amount = # of months)
CustomField.label: Payback (Months)
